description:
A little girl demon that was taken in by Orikata, Aya. She`s a very loving and energetic little girl. She doesn`t remember much about her mother. Hotaru tells her that if she`s good her mother will return.
Later on when Hotaru is possessed and tries to kill her, the memories of her mother being killed while protecting her come back, but at the end she still tells Hotaru that she will be a good girl for her mother.
name: Mugi
